title: Luna's Prophecy
description: To escape the tragic loss of her parents, Luna moves thousands of miles across the globe. The small snowy town seems perfect for Luna to start her life again but the fates have other ideas. Learning that her life has never been her own to live, sheâ€™s plunged into a world that she had no idea even existed. Luna has no choice but to put her faith in the dark stranger because their souls belong to each other.
author: Lisa   Barker
